I am a husband, a father, and <nowiki>[[http://matthewhelmke.com/|a writer]]</nowiki>. I am coauthor of "The Official Ubuntu Book" and "VMware Cookbook" and am the author of "Ubuntu Unleashed".

* I am an <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntumembers|Ubuntu member]]</nowiki> and have been since August 21, 2006.

* I was a member of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/ForumCouncil|Forum Council]]</nowiki> (one of the admins) for the <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntuforums.org/|Official Ubuntu Forums]]</nowiki> from December 2006 to April 2011, including the council chairmanship for most of that last year. I was a staff member in the forums from 2005-2012.

* I am a past member of the <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Membership/RegionalBoards/EMEA|Europe, Middle East and Africa regional approval board]]</nowiki>.
